read_only.description: Whether Microsoft server is read only

dhcp_utilization.description: The percentage of the total DHCP utilization of DHCP objects belonging to the DHCP Microsoft Server multiplied by 1000. This is the percentage of the total number of available IP addresses from all the DHCP objects belonging to the DHCP Microsoft Server versus the total number of all IP addresses in all of the DHCP objects on the DHCP Microsoft Server.

last_sync_ts.description: Timestamp of the last synchronization attempt

dynamic_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP leases issued for the DHCP objects on the DHCP Microsoft Server.

login_password.description: The login password of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

synchronization_interval.description: The minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations.

status_detail.description: Detailed status of the DHCP status

supports_failover.description: Flag indicating if the DHCP supports Failover

total_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP addresses configured in DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

status.description: Status of the Microsoft DHCP Service

address.description: The address or FQDN of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

next_sync_control.description: Defines what control to apply on the DHCP server

static_hosts.description: The number of static DHCP addresses configured in DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

login_name.description: The login name of the DHCP Microsoft Server.

dhcp_utilization_status.description: A string describing the utilization level of DHCP objects that belong to the DHCP Microsoft Server.

enable_dns_reports_sync.description: Determines if synchronization of DNS reporting data from the Microsoft server is enabled or not.

address.description: The address or FQDN of the DNS Microsoft Server.

synchronization_interval.description: The minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations.

login_password.description: The login password of the DNS Microsoft Server.

login_name.description: The login name of the DNS Microsoft Server.

comment.description: User comments for this Microsoft Server

grid_member.description: eference to the assigned grid member

address.description: The address or FQDN of the server.

disabled.description: Allow/forbids usage of this Microsoft Server

use_log_destination.description: Override log_destination inherited from grid level

use_ms_rpc_timeout_in_seconds.description: Flag to override cluster RPC timeout

log_destination.description: Directs logging of sync messages either to syslog or mslog

connection_status.description: Result of the last RPC connection attempt made

ad_user.description: The Active Directory User synchronization information.

connection_status_detail.description: Detail of the last connection attempt made

managing_member.description: Hostname of grid member managing this Microsoft Server

ms_max_connection.description: Maximum number of connections to MS server

synchronization_status_detail.description: Detail status if synchronization_status is ERROR

read_only.description: Enable read-only management for this Microsoft Server

root_ad_domain.description: The root Active Directory domain to which this server belongs (if applicable).

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

synchronization_min_delay.description: Minimum number of minutes between two synchronizations

log_level.description: Log level for this Microsoft Server

ad_domain.description: The Active Directory domain to which this server belongs (if applicable).

server_name.description: Gives the server name as reported by itself

ms_rpc_timeout_in_seconds.description: Timeout in seconds of RPC connections for this MS Server

dhcp_server.description: RW fields needed for DHCP purposes at Microsoft Server level

login_name.description: Microsoft Server login name, with optional domainname

last_seen.description: Timestamp of the last message received

high_water_mark_reset.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage after which an alarm will be reset.

high_water_mark.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage after which an alarm will be active.

dhcp_utilization.description: The percentage of the total DHCP usage of the ranges in the superscope.

name.description: The name of the Microsoft DHCP superscope.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which the superscope resides.

dynamic_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP leases issued for the DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

ranges.description: The list of DHCP ranges that are associated with the superscope.

total_hosts.description: The total number of DHCP addresses configured in DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

low_water_mark_reset.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage below which an alarm will be reset.

disable.description: Determines whether the superscope is disabled.

low_water_mark.description: The percentage value for DHCP range usage below which an alarm will be active.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

static_hosts.description: The number of static DHCP addresses configured in DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

dhcp_utilization_status.description: Utilization level of the DHCP range objects that belong to the superscope.

domain.description: The reference to the Active Directory Domain to which the site belongs.

name.description: The name of the site properties object for the Active Directory Sites.

networks.description: The list of networks to which the device interfaces belong.

read_only.description: Determines whether the Active Directory Domain properties object is a read-only object.

name.description: The name of the Active Directory Domain properties object.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which the Active Directory Domain resides.

ea_definition.description: The name of the Extensible Attribute Definition object that is linked to the Active Directory Sites Domain.

ms_sync_master_name.description: The IP address or FQDN of the managing master for the MS server, if applicable.

netbios.description: The NetBIOS name of the Active Directory Domain properties object.
